uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

protocol_type.description: Applies to protocol matching this field.

icmp_type.description: Applies to icmp type matching this field. Only PT_ICMP protocol_type support icmp_type

icmp_code.description: Applies to icmp code matching this field. Only PT_ICMP protocol_type support icmp_code

igmp_type.description: Applies to igmp type matching this field. Only PT_IGMP protocol_type support igmp_type

is_connection_established.description: is_connection_established. Only PT_TCP  protocol_type support is_connection_established

match_bit.description: The set of tcp match bits . Only PT_TCP  protocol_type support match_bit

source_port.description: Applies to source port matching this filter. Only PT_SCTP,PT_TCP and PT_UDP Protocol types support source_port

destination_port.description: Applies to destination port matching this filter. Only PT_SCTP,PT_TCP and PT_UDP Protocol types support destination_port

source_ip_address.description: Applies to source IP Address/Subnet matching this filter.

source_ip_mask.description: Wildcard Mask. source_ip_mask is the result of inversing the subnet mask of source_ip_address.

destination_ip_address.description: Applies to destination IP Address/Subnet matching this filter.

destination_ip_mask.description: Wildcard Mask. destination_ip_mask is the result of inversing the subnet mask of destination_ip_address.

device_type.description: Applies to device type matching this filter.

application_type.description: Applies to the application matching this filter.
